2.3. Module pyd1.d1const¶

Created:20100111
Author:vieglais

Provides various constants for the PyD1 client.

pyd1.d1const.DEFAULT_LISTOBJECTS¶
Default number of objects to retrieve in a list objects request
pyd1.d1const.HTTP_RESPONSE_CACHE¶
Default cache to use with client connections. Setting to None prevents caching of any responses. Setting to “/tmp” will cache responses in the /tmp filesystem
pyd1.d1const.HTTP_STATUS_OK¶
These HTTP response status codes are OK.
pyd1.d1const.MAX_LISTOBJECTS¶
Maximum number of entries per list objects request
pyd1.d1const.OBJECT_CLASSES¶
types of objects in the DataONE system
pyd1.d1const.RESPONSE_TIMEOUT¶
HTTP Response timeout in seconds, float.
pyd1.d1const.SYSTEM_METADATA_SCHEMA_URL¶
Path to the DataONE system metadata schema
pyd1.d1const.URL_DATAONE_ROOT¶
The root of all DataONE. Used to perform introspection on the system when no other node information is provided.
pyd1.d1const.URL_OBJECT_PATH¶
Path to append to target base for the object collection
pyd1.d1const.URL_SYSMETA_PATH¶
Path to append to target base for system metadata collection
pyd1.d1const.USER_AGENT¶
HTTP User Agent that this software is known as
pyd1.d1const.VALIDATE_SYSTEM_METADATA¶
Default setting for validating system metadata when retrieved. Note that validating every sysmeta instance will likely be kind of slow, especially is a cache is not provided to the client.
pyd1.d1const.VERSION¶
Const:Version of this software
